content: The URL used for the single logout on the Service provider side

comment.text: This translation key is used to display the URL label for a single logout endpoint on the Service provider side in a dropdown menu or button. The text appears in a tooltip that explains the purpose of this setting in the Portal Settings page.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'عنوان URL المستخدم لتسجيل الخروج الفردي من جانب مزود الخدمة' is a literal translation and may not be the most natural phrasing in Arabic. A more natural phrasing would emphasize the purpose or functionality of the URL.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: عنوان URL المستخدم لتسجيل الخروج من الخدمة

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'URL адресът, използван за единично отписване от страна на доставчика на услуги' is a bit verbose and not the most natural Bulgarian phrasing. While technically correct, it can be improved for clarity and flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL адресът за единично излизане от системата от страна на доставчика на услуги

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not a critical error, using 'излизане от системата' instead of 'отписване' might provide a better understanding within the context of a technical tooltip.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing 'отписване' with 'излизане от системата' for improved user clarity.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Kertakirjautumisessa käytetty URL palveluntarjoajan puolella' is a literal translation but lacks the nuance of 'single logout'. A more accurate and idiomatic translation would convey the purpose of the URL. 'Single logout' can also be translated more naturally.

The translation 'Ծառայությունների մատակարարի կողմից առանձին դուրս գալու համար' is a bit literal and could be improved for clarity and natural flow in Armenian. 'Service provider side' is accurately translated, but the overall phrasing sounds awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Համակարգող ծառայությունների մատակարարի կողմից լոգաուտի համար (Logout for the service provider)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ຜູ້ໃຫ້ບໍລິການ' (phu hai borikan) can be translated more naturally as 'ຜູ້ສະຫນອງບໍລິການ' (phu sanong borikan).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL ທີ່ໃຊ້ສໍາລັບການອອກຈາກລະບົບດຽວຢູ່ໃນດ້ານຜູ້ສະຫນອງບໍລິການ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Vienotās atteikšanās vietrādis URL pakalpojuma sniedzēja pusē" is not a natural or accurate translation of "The URL used for the single logout on the Service provider side". It's overly literal and uses complex vocabulary ('vietrādis' is not commonly used in this context).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more natural translation would be something like: "URL, kas izmantojams vienreizējam izrakstīšanās procesam pakalpojumu sniedzēja pusē" or "Pakalpojumu sniedzēja puses URL, kas izmanto vienreizējai izrakstīšanai".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'O URL utilizado para o término de sessão único do lado do Fornecedor do serviço' is a bit literal and could be improved for naturalness. 'Término de sessão único' is a technically correct translation of 'single logout' but feels clunky. 'Fornecedor do serviço' could be simplified.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: O URL utilizado para o logout único do provedor de serviços.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, maintaining consistency in capitalization is preferable. 'Logout' should ideally match the capitalization of 'URL' and 'provedor'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: O URL utilizado para o logout único do provedor de serviços.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'සේවා ප්‍රතිපාදකයාගේ පස තනි නික්මීම සඳහා මෙම ඒ.ස.නි. භාවිතා කරයි' doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'The URL used for the single logout on the Service provider side'.  'පස' (pasa) translates to 'side' but isn't appropriate in this context. 'ඒ.ස.නි.' (A.S.N.i.) appears to be an abbreviation, but its meaning is unclear without further context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more accurate translation would be something like 'සේවා ප්‍රદાයකයාගේ ඒකතනි ල໊ග්අව්ට් සඳහා භාවිතා වන URL මෙයයි' (Sewa pradayakaya age ekathani logout samaana vaadunava url meya idai) which translates to 'This is the URL used for the single logout on the Service Provider side'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'URL, uporabljen za enkratno odjavo na strani ponudnika storitev' is a literal translation but doesn't flow naturally in Slovenian. It's slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL za enkratno odjavo na strani ponudnika storitev

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'ponudnika storitev' is a more formal way of saying 'service provider'. A more conversational option could be considered.
The English phrase 'single logout' is better translated as 'јединачки одјављивање' rather than 'једнострано одјављивање'. 'Једнострано' implies one-sidedness, which isn't the intended meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL који се користи за јединачко одјављивање на страни пружаоца услуга

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a hyphen (-) instead of an em dash (—) after 'URL-адреса'. While not incorrect, an em dash would improve readability and is generally preferred in more formal writing.

The translation 'đăng xuất một lần' is a literal translation of 'single logout'. While understandable, a more natural and common phrasing in Vietnamese would be 'đăng xuất duy nhất' or simply 'đăng xuất'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL được sử dụng cho đăng xuất duy nhất ở phía Nhà cung cấp dịch vụ
